summary: REQ-6 appears implemented via a new SiteNoticeTicker component inserted into the shared sticky header in App.tsx, with Tailwind marquee keyframes/animation added to enable continuous scrolling across routes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a promotional footer line/link to caffeine.ai (with UTM parameters) and a heart emoji in the footer.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for a site-wide scrolling notice/ticker in the header; it does not request adding or changing footer content or adding external promotional links.
